targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  latitude AS latitude_last,
  longitude AS longitude_last,
  ground_heading_deg * 100000 AS ground_heading_deg
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  latitude,
  longitude,
  carrier_phase_range_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  time,
  latitude,
  horizontal_accuracy_m
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  fix_ok_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND fix_ok_int IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  ntrip_client_rtcm_received_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND ntrip_client_rtcm_received_int IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  fix_type_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND fix_type_int IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  carrier_phase_range_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND carrier_phase_range_int IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  time,
  altitude_m,
  altitude_m + vertical_accuracy_m AS upper_bound,
  altitude_m - vertical_accuracy_m AS lower_bound
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND altitude_m IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  last_correction_age_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND last_correction_age_int IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  time,
  ground_speed_ms,
  ground_speed_ms + speed_accuracy_ms AS upper_bound,
  GREATEST(ground_speed_ms - speed_accuracy_ms, 0) AS lower_bound
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND ground_speed_ms IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  num_sats_tracked,
  num_sats_carrier_locked
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) 
ORDER BY
  time

panels.title: Line of Sight (% of expected satellites RTK-locked)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  num_sats_code_locked
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND num_sats_code_locked IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  time,
  latitude AS latitude_last,
  longitude AS longitude_last,
  ground_heading_deg * 100000 AS ground_heading_deg
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  latitude,
  longitude,
  carrier_phase_range_int
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  num_sats_carrier_locked
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND num_sats_carrier_locked IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  num_sats_tracked,
  num_sats_visible
FROM
  station_telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) 
ORDER BY
  time

panels.title: Line of Sight (% of expected satellites visible)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  num_sats_code_locked
FROM
  station_telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND num_sats_code_locked IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT
  time,
  latitude AS latitude_last,
  longitude AS longitude_last
FROM
  station_telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND latitude IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  num_sats_carrier_locked
FROM
  station_telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND num_sats_carrier_locked IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time

actions.confirmation: Are you sure you want to enroll $name as 192.168.100.$octet?
actions.title: Enroll Node

value.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove ${__data.fields["VPN IP"]}?
value.title: Remove

value.confirmation: Are you sure you want to rename ${__data.fields["Node Name"]} (${__data.fields["VPN IP"]}) to $name?
value.title: Rename

value.confirmation: Are you sure you want to send $msg to ${__data.fields["Node Name"]} (${__data.fields["VPN IP"]})?
value.title: Send UBX

value.confirmation: Are you sure you want to set known coordinates on ${__data.fields["VPN IP"]}?
value.title: Set Known Coordinates

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  id::BIGINT,
  vpn_ip,
  group_name,
  id::BIGINT as Actions,
  ping,
  ping AS ping_avg,
  ping AS ping_trend
FROM network_telemetry
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND ping IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC
